section.title: Ingestion File Conventions
section.para: All files uploaded for ingestion should follow these conventions:

listitem.para: They should be UTF-8 encoded unless otherwise specified.

Machine-readable timestamps use epoch (UNIX) time. Since an epoch time string is used in the job ID value for ingestion jobs, you can find them in the file names for log and error files produced by each job.
Human-readable timestamps use a formatted date/time string.
